sentences: Andra Generationen is a Swedish band with Balkan music roots.
The group's debut album, KÃ¤rlekens land, charted at #31 on the Swedish Albums Chart on 27 February 2004.
Four years later they appeared in Melodifestivalen with the song "Kebabpizza Slivovitza", which became their first big hit and charted at #2 on the Swedish Singles Chart.
The album containing the song, Extra allt, charted at #32 on the albums chart.
In 2010 they participated in Melodifestivalen again, this time together with Dogge Doggelito.
